website_summaries.verdict: A pleasantly scented mask that leaves normal skin bright and clean.
pros: Skin appears brighter after continued use
Leaves skin feeling clean and soft
Mild citrus scent is appealing to most
3.4-ounce tube sits at a low price point
cons: Not ideal for sensitive skin, some report a slight burning sensation

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviews have mentioned, there is a slight burning when you first apply the mask but it only lasts for about a minute. After it dried I could definitely feel the product at work deep in my skin, it felt amazing! Plus it smells wonderful! I would recommend using moisturizer afterwards, but it leaves your face feeling really clean and fresh! I can't wait to start seeing results!
customer_reviews.author: Bri H.

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin (oops)
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend for sensitive skin. I bought this at a risk knowing it may be too harsh for me and it was. I could tell it pulled gunk up and some out but my face was red for 2 days after and felt like it was on fire. I used a calming mud mask from target and that seemed to calm my face down, but the results definitely aren't worth the 2 day effects (for me).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaves my acne prone skin feeling cleaner and tighter but ...
customer_reviews.text: Leaves my acne prone skin feeling cleaner and tighter but not dry. It does dry some of the oil, but I don’t feel it’s excessivly drying. I’m very fair complected and as the mask dries it is almost the same color as my skin, which has elicited weird reactions from my husband and son. They don’t notice it straight away, but notice my face looks ‘weird’, so I wish it was slightly darker drying.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea C.

customer_reviews.title: I love this face mask
customer_reviews.text: I love this face mask! It tingles slightly when applied, but that's because it works! It reduces the appearence of blackheads and leaves your face feeling smooth and clean!
customer_reviews.author: Katie P

customer_reviews.title: thick
customer_reviews.text: I do like this product. It is a bit on the thick side. It does dry out my skin a bit which I don't care for. However, it does help bring out all the grossness out of my pores. I do get little white heads that are east to pop the next morning but they never stay long after popping them.
customer_reviews.author: Florence Trombly

customer_reviews.title: Smells yum!
customer_reviews.text: I use a lot of the Formula 10.0.6 products, but this mask is by far one of my favorites! I have very oily skin and this mask really helps to control it while making my skin soft and smooth. And it smells super delicious! This is definitely one of my go to masks whenever I feel like pampering myself. Also, the price is one that cannot be beat
customer_reviews.author: C. DeMers

customer_reviews.title: A BIG YES
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely WORSHIP this product. You can get a ton of use out of these tubes, which are full size. Absolutely recommended
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: My go-to mask!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite mud mask! Wonderful scent and it makes my skin smell so smooth!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Beverage

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Right from the start it feels like it's working. Makes your skin feel smooth and soft after use!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Bell

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous to try this brand because my face is usually pretty sensitive but after a few times of using the mask I could see results. My skin was so smooth and very soft after the first time using it. It has reduced breakouts and I'm beginning to notice my acne scars fading. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This has made a difference in my skin ! This is a great detox mask
customer_reviews.author: Trish Goff

customer_reviews.title: love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! It works best on deep cystic acne which I got when i stopped birth control
customer_reviews.author: neeka

customer_reviews.title: The Best Mask and Value !
customer_reviews.text: Great mask. Slight tingling at first but goes away quickly. Great at reducing oil and blemishes Great price !! Our new favorite mask
customer_reviews.author: Grant B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: It really is as good as everyone says it is. I've noticed it has a warm tingling feeling when you first apply it to your clean face, so I figure that it's doing something right. I've used this product now for about 4 weeks, 2-3 times each week. I use other Formula 10.0.6 products for every day use, but this mud mask really helps brighten my face and give it a really smooth complexion. Especially with my skin type (combination). I highly recommend this. For the price, you can't really beat a good product from a well-known brand that specializes in skincare.
customer_reviews.author: ShaeTop Contributor: Hair Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: This mask helps clear up my blackheads which I love since blackheads are a constant struggle for me. It has a very pleasant smell as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon junkie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I was delighted to discover that this product was still available. I have used since the 1960s!!
customer_reviews.author: Granny Becky

customer_reviews.title: Get that face clean
customer_reviews.text: Perfect mask for you. Promise. It'll leave your face sparkling and brand new.
customer_reviews.author: John Stein

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I would say the smell is the best part. I use this about twice a week and it works great. It is super easy to get off in the shower and leaves my skin super soft and moisturized. I orginally bought this to get rid of my acne around my chin and the "triangle". I wouldn't say it takes care of the acne as well as I would have hoped, but it feels like it removes the excess oil and dirt from my face. I would make sure to use a moisturizer afterwards to not overdry your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Sportzmaster87

customer_reviews.title: Fair
customer_reviews.text: It was not really what I was expecting. My friends thought it was kind of itchy but I did not think it was bad
customer_reviews.author: KlaRoo333

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: 2 thumbs up. It actually worked as in it cleansed away those stubborn black head on my nose and chin. I love it plain and simple and if smells lovely.
customer_reviews.author: robin

customer_reviews.title: This broke my face out worse! My face has been hot and flushed and ...
customer_reviews.text: This broke my face out worse! My face has been hot and flushed and dry since I got it! I thought I may need to give it a few days but it’s been last that.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great mask
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stuff. It makes my skin feel soft and healthy, and makes it look healthier too. Since using this in combination with my other acne care, I've experienced way less breakouts. And I like the orangy smell!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: This is a great mask. My skin feels amazing after I use ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mask. My skin feels amazing after I use it. I have been using it once a week for 3 weeks. I'm not sure it has made much of a difference on my complexion, but my skin does feel better. I use just a thin layer and let it dry. I haven't used a mask since I was in college, so it was just fun to start doing again. It dries within 15 minutes and comes off with soap and a wash clothe. Seriously, my I love the way my face feels when it is done. It's also really clean and thick so I don't get it all over the bathroom, or me!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: I really love this face mask
customer_reviews.text: I really love this face mask. It does exactly what it says and smells great! This is my second time purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: Nallely Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best face mask ever! I've used this for years and highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Black

customer_reviews.title: ... Egh
customer_reviews.text: I guess this mask is designed for people with sensitive skin or something. It is NOT a sea mud mask. It didn't work for me. Shipping was fast... But then agsin i payed for 2 day shipping. I used it 2x and that was it
customer_reviews.author: Lovely Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great Mask
customer_reviews.text: This works great. It does have a slight tingle, but I was having bad acne on my jaw-line/neck area, and I could tell a difference in a matter of days.
customer_reviews.author: L. LeFevre

customer_reviews.title: I think it works
customer_reviews.text: I look better with the mud on... and it smells really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Silent til I speak

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Great for the skin and reasonable. You most definitely won't be wasting your money with the this. I haven't tried the other products yet but I'm pretty sure the whole line is great
customer_reviews.author: Brittany's Ms Michelle styled

customer_reviews.title: Overall good
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the product, I use it twice a week and it leaves me skin feelin smooth clean and refreshed
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Its strong
customer_reviews.text: I don't really notice any difference in my skin appearance.
customer_reviews.author: C. Haire

customer_reviews.title: Citrus infused pick me up
customer_reviews.text: Good mask. Very relaxing and can tell a small difference after using it. An ideal mask to use for a quick citrus infused pick me up. My favorite part of this mask is the scent. Keeps you glowing.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: although my skin felt fresh and looked nice after using it
customer_reviews.text: I don't really trust this as a cleansing mask. It didn't do much for my breakouts, although my skin felt fresh and looked nice after using it.
customer_reviews.author: sasha davis

customer_reviews.title: I really liked this mask
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this mask. It smells soo good and after a few uses my skin looked brighter and my pores were visibly smaller. I don't suffer from a lot of acne just the occasional blemish but I don't recall any breakouts while this mask was in my regimen. I recommend using it twice a week. The only thing is that this kind of stings, kind of a lot. For the first 10minutes it kinda hurts. It never left my face red, or irritated in any way but it definitely stung every time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Facial Mask
customer_reviews.text: This product makes the face feel so velvety and clean. It only requires a very small amount the cover the face. This product also helped clear up some pimples on my face. I am pleased with this product and would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Jay & Deb

customer_reviews.title: It is a good mask and makes my face feel clean
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this twice now. It is a good mask and makes my face feel clean. The only reason why I gave it four stars is because it tends to dry out my face if I use it more than once a week. However, I live in the desert so others may not have that reaction.
customer_reviews.author: JNW

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff. I put it on after working out and let it sit on my face before taking a shower. It is kind of hard to get off, so that's why I do it before a shower. It smells great and it just feels like it is working.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Roesing

customer_reviews.title: A must!
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best face mask I have ever tried. I have seborrheic dermatitis, and part of this condition causes a lot of oil to be produced on the face. It's only in the last year of my life I've ever even had an acne or oily skin problems and I turn 29 next week. I can use face wash and a scrub and still would get oil coming off on blotting paper. But this product? AMAZING. It gets all of the oil out. No other face mask I have tried using even came close to the results from this one. If you have oily skin, you MUST try this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kat Cole

customer_reviews.title: The best for oily skin!
customer_reviews.text: The best mask for oily skin I have ever tried! Have been using this one a few years now. The best way to remove it - sponge with warm water. Skin gets perfectly smooth and pores disappear!
customer_reviews.author: Yuliya

customer_reviews.title: didn't work for me but...
customer_reviews.text: It made me breakout even more, I've got dry skin and when I try to moisturize I break out, I as hoping this would keep my skin moisturized and help the breakouts but it made it worse. I had my fiance do it with me and he has oily skin, the next day he woke up and his skin looked flawless. Not so great for me, but it worked for him.
customer_reviews.author: Makenzie

customer_reviews.title: Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't notice any differences after using this produce. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ernestine

customer_reviews.title: The first time I used it I felt my skin ...
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used it I felt my skin clean and softer but after the fifth time, I just felt it was cleaning superficially and didnt get the same effect as before. I use it maybe 2-3 times a week. I’m still use it and it smells delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I do not really notice any difference in my skin appearance. I used this product once every 2-3 days.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Adams

customer_reviews.title: It smells amazing, a bit like citrus and the mud pack ...
customer_reviews.text: It smells amazing, a bit like citrus and the mud pack itself wasn't dark so it doesn't taint. It's like a light beige and it begins to thicken and tighten really quickly once it's applied. I love that. It gave a very refreshing, cool feeling after. Definitely going to purchase this again!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Awful. It burns while on my face. First ...
customer_reviews.text: Awful. It burns while on my face. First time using it, I could only wear it for about 1 minutes & then it starting burning.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn Forrester

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: My face burned when I put it on for about a minute or so but then went away. When I washed it off it left my skin super soft and clean!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this facial mask. I've struggled with acne for as long as I remember and this stuff takes the redness away and you can see a significant difference. The smell is also really good.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna Adams

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite face mask
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite face mask. It tingles a little but I like that bec then I know it's working.
customer_reviews.author: I love Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Skin
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing you can feel the detox working my skin is clear and looking fresh I use this every other day after my workout.
customer_reviews.author: Que

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I got these for a couple of my girlfriends and myself, I really like it! Makes my skin feel smooth!
customer_reviews.author: Ava Funderburk

customer_reviews.title: So glad I found this!
customer_reviews.text: I don't have much experience with masks, I've only tried maybe three or four other types but this is definitely my favorite and I have no desire to shop around. The smell is amazing. That in and of itself makes it a winner. Plus I love that it dries clear, but starts out colored because I have others that are just clear and its hard to tell where I've put it on. I try to use it about three times a week and I definitely feel clean afterwards. So glad I found this. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: mkaitlynk

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff!! Got it as a gift 2 years ago & have been using it ever since. Enjoy!!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Face Mask Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in a pharmacy in Vancouver and it was perfection for me skin my acne scars and pore have cleared so much
customer_reviews.author: Maarsel Putala

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: does the job, I don't have much more to say in the matter other than it does the job and I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: MMMM.....

customer_reviews.title: Like i said i dont use it very often so ...
customer_reviews.text: Still not sure how i feel about this. It burns my face a little so i dont use it as often as i should, although the times i have used it i noticed a small difference in my face clearing up some pores. Like i said i dont use it very often so it may work better for someone who uses it by the recommended use. Easy to apply, its pretty thick and you can actually see it sink into your pores when you put it on. Rinsing it takes a minute though because its very clay like so maybe use a wash cloth instead of just your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Nice mask for a nice price
customer_reviews.text: Nice mask for a nice price. I use several times a week and it keeps in oil in control.
customer_reviews.author: S. Caraballlo

customer_reviews.title: Good mask
customer_reviews.text: I really like this facial mask. I have skin problems (eczema) and it did not break me out. I only used it once so far, and I can tell a difference already. I will use it again later this month. I will buy this mask again.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Mask
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I use it up to 3x a week and it has worked wonders for my skin!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Dodson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Leaves your skin feeling super soft. Smells good too. Has a mild citrus scent. Nothing too strong. Just enough to be enjoyable. Goes on smooth and easily. Doesn't get rock hard, and uncomfortable when it's set. Just a little tension. Really great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Healon

customer_reviews.title: The detox mud mask hardens and I'm not sure I like it as much
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought the travel size package of products from this brand at old navy. The detox mud mask hardens and I'm not sure I like it as much. I use it every now and then, but I'd prefer a product that doesn't harden on my face. I had a mild breakout but nothing serious, hence my using it seldom.
customer_reviews.author: Brina V

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! If you already have good skin i recommend using this 1-2 times per week! I bought 5!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Yvan

customer_reviews.title: good for oily skin people
customer_reviews.text: i love this mask so much! i always use it after the shower. when i rinse it off, my skin feels super bright and clean. it helps my oily face from being too oily. my aunt is in her 40s and she also uses this! this works wonders .
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective
customer_reviews.text: This mask did wonders for my skin! I have normal/dry skin, with a moderate case of acne, and its very very touchy. Probably from years of slathering on make up and not washing it off at night. Everything I've tried is either too severe or not strong at all. This mask definitley clears up my zits and my skin feels softer. I recommend using it every other day.
customer_reviews.author: linfuen

customer_reviews.title: Sadly, this did little for my face.
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, this did little for my face. I read the reviews about it "stinging" or burning a little and was excited (I like to feel like a face mask is doing something!) but nope I felt nothing. Its your typical mask you put it on it dries and your skin becomes tight but that's about it. I didn't notice anything very special afterwards either. I cant say that I would order it again sadly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael O'Rourke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, it deep cleans and leaves your skin soft.
customer_reviews.author: Maria A Loretto

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this mud mask it works great, I can see the difference and in my pores which where big now their small. And it smells greatb
customer_reviews.author: K. Butler

customer_reviews.title: Love this mask
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask. It's just a nice simple cleaning mask. Works like a charm and does not cost a fortune.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Redlin

customer_reviews.title: but I like the mask overall
customer_reviews.text: Texture is odd, but I like the mask overall. It is a mild formula. This is the only product I have bought from this line, but after this I plan on trying another.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Spradling

product_meta.title: Formula Ten O Six Deep Down Detox Facial Masks, 3.4 Fluid Ounce
product_meta.description: Formula Ten O Six Deep Down Detox Facial Masks, 3.4 Fluid Ounce
feature_bullets: CLEANSING MUD MASK: This super-cleansing detox mask reduces the appearance of impurities for a clearer, brighter complexion. Cleanse, balance and get your deepest detox yet!

DETOX & FIND A CLEARER COMPLEXION: Hydrate and balance oils in skin with this detoxifying mud mask. This product is recommended for oily, blemish-prone skin, and can be used in areas such as the T-Zone that naturally produce more oil.
FORMULATED WITH ORANGE & BERGAMOT: The energy of orange recharges, while sea salt cleanses and bergamot balances. This product is vegan, paraben-free, sulfate-free, dye-free & cruelty-free.

HOW TO USE: Apply to freshly cleansed and dried skin. Apply a thin coating over face and neck, avoiding eye area. Allow mask to dry for 10 - 15 minutes then rinse thoroughly with warm water. Pat skin dry. Use 1 - 3 times per week.

CLEAR SKIN STARTS HERE: First created by our family chemist back in 1933, Formula 10.0.6 has always been all about supporting troublesome skin with tried, tested and trusted formulations that do exactly what they say on the bottle. Made with everything you need and absolutely nothing you don't, say hello to skin good enough to go bare.
